name: Sky (itch) (Noge)
description:
1st place at 2018's Women TechMakers Game Jam.

Theme: Women vs Evil. Made in 48h.

If you have to fight the evil in this world, 

you may have to start by fighting yourself.

                     CONTROLS                     

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

(controller also supported)

                        CREDITS
